# Productivity

  • WeVideo — Online video editor for web, mobile, Windows & MacOS.

  • SpeedCoder — Typing practice for programmers.

  • Astro File Manager — Organize, find, and access internal and external files on Android phones.

  • Evernote — Cross-platform, freemium app designed for note taking, organizing, and archiving.

  • GoodReader — Great for storing and reading (and annotating) PDFs on your device. Many options for syncing and downloading.

  • Resilio — File synchronization between individuals and devices locally — without using the cloud.

  • SHAREit — Transfer files on local WiFi connections.

  • Coffitivity — Coffeeshop background sounds.

  • Egg Timer — A simple countdown timer in the browser.

  • Noisli — Background noise & color generator.

  • PDF Escape — Online PDF editor and form filler.

  • Small PDF — All sorts of free PDF services.

  • Time.is — Current time around the world.

  • WiFi Map — Passwords for public places.

  • 7-Zip — My preferred archiver for zipped and compressed files - small digital footprint and easily transportable.

  • Android File Transfer — Incredibly useful software that allows you to browse and transfer files between your Mac computer and your Android device.

  • Atom — Text editor (similar to Sublime) built by Github — free and open-source.

  • Calibre — E-book application suite that allows users to manage e-book collections as well as to create, edit, and read e-books.

  • CCleaner — System optimization, privacy and cleaning tool.

  • FocusWriter — Simple, distraction-free writing environment.

  • Foxit Reader — PDF document viewer and creator for PCs.

  • LibreOffice — Office suite that includes word processing, spreadsheets, slideshows, diagrams and drawings, databases, and composing mathematical formulae. (Mostly) compatible with Microsoft Office formats.

  • Notepad++ (Windows) — Text editor which supports several programming languages.

  • SpaceSniffer — Tree map visualize and understand how folders and files are structured on your disks.

  • Sumatra PDF (Windows) — PDF, eBook (ePub, Mobi), XPS, DjVu, CHM, Comic Book (CBZ and CBR) reader for Windows.

  • Graphite — Secure, decentralized, and user-owned file creation, file storage, communication, and sharing.
